name: Mortie College
description:
Get through life at college. Help Mortie and his girlfriend Ashley who just have attended to college to fit in and learn what they are supposed to. Make friends, study and stay away from bullies in this family friendly visual novel.

Survive college
Avoid bullies and study as best as you can.

A good story
Go through a nice and simple story about friendship and life itself.

A family friendly visual novel
This Visual Novel is family friendly, and fits for all ages.

Point and click
Point and click through this fun little visual novel.
